title: Perform Statistical Process Control (SPC) Analysis
description: A quality engineer is monitoring a critical process parameter and wants to analyze its SPC chart.

tasks.description: Select the process parameter (e.g., 'Torque') and the machine to be analyzed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct parameter from the SPC system.

tasks.description: Generate the X-bar and R control chart for the last 24 hours of data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent views the control chart on their screen.

tasks.description: Identify a trend on the chart where seven consecutive points are all above the centerline, indicating a potential process shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies a rule violation on the SPC chart and flags it for investigation.
